name: 霍弘毅
objective:
Dr. Wall
152222 Freshman Grammar and Rhetoric
Wednesdays, Period 3-4

Description: In this course we will review basic grammar: parts of speech and function in the sentence, phrases, clauses, style and paragraph coherence.  We will then develop techniques for linking paragraphs into various types of writings including essays.  Point of view, theses development and argument will be examined including summary, paraphrase, and direct quotation with MLA style citations.

Readings: 　　Handouts
Grading: 　　Short papers 25%  　　Mid-term paper  35%  　　Final paper 50%
